settings.title: Perspective Settings
settings.api_key_help: Your API key from Google for the Perspective API
settings.threshold_help: This is the max score (in whole numbers) before a post is automatically flagged
settings.maxscore_help: This setting informs the plugin to use the max value returned instead of average
settings.donotstore_help: This setting informs google not to store the data sent to it
settings.experimental_help: This setting should only be enabled if your language is unsupported by production perspective models
